entry.title: Vulnerability Review:CVE-2024-57727 Simple Help Unauthenticated Path Traversal Vulnerability

link.title: Vulnerability Review:CVE-2024-57727 Simple Help Unauthenticated Path Traversal Vulnerability

entry.summary:
Overview
SimpleHelp is a remote support software that allows technical support personnel to remotely view and control the customer’s computer to provide instant assistance. It supports multiple operating systems and features unattended access, monitoring alerts, and management of remote computers. It also emphasizes data security with support for encryption and two-factor authentication, makin...
